name: Neon Shack
description:
This game was made for the Minijam 58 in 40 hours

This game contains 2 levels that are very hard. Please do not break anything while you play this game 

I did all the art, the gameplay, the code, and the music

I'll be making a video about how I made this game in such a short time on my Youtube And follow me on Twitter and Twitch To see more amazing content
